sdtmchecks2 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

    Utility function to obtain Rave row

    roche_derive_rave_row.Rd

    This function derives the Rave row number from XXSPID

    roche_derive_rave_row(dts, domains = c("ae", "cm"))

    Arguments

    dts

    dataset e.g. AE

    domains

    domains you wish to identify a SPID variable from

    Value

    dataset with rave row number

    Author

    Stella Banjo (HackR 2021)

    Examples

    
AE <- data.frame(
  STUDY = c(rep("GO29537", 6)),
  DOMAIN = c(rep("AE", 6)),
  USUBJID = c(rep("GO29537-278300-30221", 6)),
  AESEQ = c(1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6),
  AETERM = c("ANEMIA", "ANEMIA", "ANOREXIA", "CONSTIPATION", "DIARRHEA", "FATIGUE"),
  AEDECOD = c("ANAEMIA", "ANAEMIA", "DECREASED APPETITE", "CONSTIPATION", "DIARRHOEA", "FATIGUE"),
  AESPID = c("/F:AEDE-D:22028232-R:13/L:13/AT:INITIALEXTREME",
             "/F:AEDE-D:22028232-R:16/L:16/AT:INITIALEXTREME",
             "/F:AEDE-D:22028232-R:2/L:2/AT:INITIALEXTREME",
             "/F:AEDE-D:22028232-R:19/L:19/AT:INITIALEXTREME",
             "/F:AEDE-D:22028232-R:5/L:5/AT:INITIALEXTREME",
             "/F:AEDE-D:22028232-R:20/L:20/AT:INITIALEXTREME"),
  AESTDTC = c("2015-08-12", "2015-09-02", "2015-07-02", "2015-08-19", "2015-07-17", "2015-08-12")
)

roche_derive_rave_row(AE)
#>     STUDY DOMAIN              USUBJID AESEQ       AETERM            AEDECOD
#> 1 GO29537     AE GO29537-278300-30221     1       ANEMIA            ANAEMIA
#> 2 GO29537     AE GO29537-278300-30221     2       ANEMIA            ANAEMIA
#> 3 GO29537     AE GO29537-278300-30221     3     ANOREXIA DECREASED APPETITE
#> 4 GO29537     AE GO29537-278300-30221     4 CONSTIPATION       CONSTIPATION
#> 5 GO29537     AE GO29537-278300-30221     5     DIARRHEA          DIARRHOEA
#> 6 GO29537     AE GO29537-278300-30221     6      FATIGUE            FATIGUE
#>                                           AESPID    AESTDTC    RAVE
#> 1 /F:AEDE-D:22028232-R:13/L:13/AT:INITIALEXTREME 2015-08-12 AEDE#13
#> 2 /F:AEDE-D:22028232-R:16/L:16/AT:INITIALEXTREME 2015-09-02 AEDE#16
#> 3   /F:AEDE-D:22028232-R:2/L:2/AT:INITIALEXTREME 2015-07-02  AEDE#2
#> 4 /F:AEDE-D:22028232-R:19/L:19/AT:INITIALEXTREME 2015-08-19 AEDE#19
#> 5   /F:AEDE-D:22028232-R:5/L:5/AT:INITIALEXTREME 2015-07-17  AEDE#5
#> 6 /F:AEDE-D:22028232-R:20/L:20/AT:INITIALEXTREME 2015-08-12 AEDE#20


RS <- data.frame(
   USUBJID = c("1"),
   RSSPID = c("/F:EDT_RSP", "/F:MRSP1-D:23456-R:0", "/F:RRSP1-D:23456-R:0")
   )

roche_derive_rave_row(RS)
#>   USUBJID               RSSPID
#> 1       1           /F:EDT_RSP
#> 2       1 /F:MRSP1-D:23456-R:0
#> 3       1 /F:RRSP1-D:23456-R:0

SS <- data.frame(
   USUBJID = c("1"),
   SSSPID = c("/F:EDT_SS", "/F:LTFU-D:23456-R:0", "/F:LTFU-D:23456-R:0", "123sdf",
   "/F:AEDE-D:22028232-R:20/L:20/AT:INITIALEXTREME")
   )

roche_derive_rave_row(SS)
#>   USUBJID                                         SSSPID
#> 1       1                                      /F:EDT_SS
#> 2       1                            /F:LTFU-D:23456-R:0
#> 3       1                            /F:LTFU-D:23456-R:0
#> 4       1                                         123sdf
#> 5       1 /F:AEDE-D:22028232-R:20/L:20/AT:INITIALEXTREME
